text: Meritxell Palmitjavila Naudí (born 20 December 1964) is an Andorran politician, current Deputy General Syndic of the General Council of Andorra since 3 May 2019, it is the Deputy Speaker of the Parliament of Andorra. She had been teacher in several Andorran schools between 1985 and 2015. Between 2009 and 2010 she was the Director of the Department of Support to Education and Educational Inspection by the Ministry of EducationMeritxell Palmitjavila Naudí Palmitjavila is member of the General Council since was elected in the 2015 Andorran parliamentary election. In the 2019 Andorran parliamentary election she head the Democrats for Andorra in the parish of Canillo and was re-elected lawmaker.Demòcrates es reforça a Canillo As she was the older member of the General Council, she presided the session of constitutionRoser Suñé esdevé la primera dona síndica general d’Andorra of the new Parliament on 2 May 2019 where was elected Deputy General Syndic.Una mujer preside el parlamento de Andorra por primera vez == References == Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Democrats for Andorra politicians Category:Members of the General Council (Andorra) Category:Andorran women in politics Category:20th-century women politicians Category:Andorran schoolteachers Category:21st-century educators Category:20th-century educators Category:20th-century women educators Category:21st-century women educators
title: Meritxell Palmitjavila Naudí
